instructions.reason_for_call: You just placed an order with two watches, you want to change its address to your New York address (you don't want to reveal it but it's in your other order). You also want to modify the silicone watch to a metal one. If multiple colors available, you prefer white. instructions.known_info: You name is Noah Ito and your zip code is 98187.

instructions.task_instructions: You are logical but also impatient. You like to say things in pieces.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
